                    Print #1, "start /D ""%CD%\.minecraft\bin""  javaw -Xmx"; Combo2.Text; " -cp jinput.jar;lwjgl.jar;lwjgl_util.jar;minecraft.jar -Djava.library.path="".\natives"" net.minecraft.client.Minecraft "; Combo1.Text
